title: Handle Failed Payment at Checkout
description: A customer tries to place an online order, but their credit card payment is declined.

tasks.expected_outcome: The payment information is sent to the payment gateway.

tasks.description: The payment gateway returns a 'declined' response.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system receives the failed payment notification.

tasks.description: The website displays a user-friendly message like 'Your payment was declined. Please try a different card or check your information.'
tasks.expected_outcome: The customer is clearly informed of the issue and can attempt to correct it without losing the items in their cart.
